english.segment1: So rejoice, be glad, rejoice, oh my soul. For the lord, your god, he reigns forevermore. And i rejoice, for my god reigns
english.segment2: So rejoice, be glad, your father and your friend. Is the lord, your god, whose rule will never end. And i rejoice, for my god reigns
english.segment3: My god reigns, and i dance the dance of praise. My god reigns, with a shout i will proclaim. My god reigns, and i worship without shame. My god reigns, oh i will rejoice.. For my god reigns
